info.description:
Shown in Randolph Leather in Tan.

OVERVIEW
This one’s for all the George Jetsons and Philip J. Frys out there! The Fidel armchair recliner, with its pointed winged headrests, curved arms and splayed conical legs, evokes the space-age style that characterises the screen interiors of The Jetsons TV show. And while the wings won’t suddenly enable lift-off, a modern-day man can simply push back on the recliner to allow the kickboard to lift up and out to reveal a small rest for tired feet.

Upholstered in supple full-grain aniline leather, this chair has comfort well covered with a kidney support back cushion, high headrest and top-quality foam core seats with fibre wraps for springy softness.
 
“The Fidel is a standout piece of furniture. It’s super sleek and has strong masculine appeal,” Freedom sofa buyer.

The Fidel armchair recliner, with its pointed winged headrests, curved arms and splayed conical legs, evokes the space-age style that characterises the screen interiors of The Jetsons TV show. And while the wings won’t suddenly enable lift-off, a modern-day man can simply push back on the recliner to allow the kickboard to lift up and out to reveal a small rest for tired feet.
Upholstered in supple full-grain aniline leather, this chair has comfort well covered with a kidney support back cushion, high headrest and top-quality foam core seats with fibre wraps for springy softness.

info.name: Fidel Armchair Recliner
